name: Engage4more
overview:
Engage4more is India’s first and only integrated Staff engagement and employer branding solutions provider.

Armed with innovative solution, Engage4more employs the more2™ principle to provide core services such as engagement advisory solutions, staff engagement events,internal communications, Event Management and employer branding and many more.

Engage4more also have expertise in organizing corporate events like town hall events, family days, annual day events, and engagement events.

Founded by the founder-director, Mr. Nishant Parashar, the spirited crew boasts several decades of combined experience, including banking, advertising, events, and more. with a firm foundation in marketing and branding, this dynamic, young team blends strategic, creative and execution capabilities to create a passionate mix.

Engage4more provides expert advisory services designed to aid corporate brands in their employee engagement efforts. The advisory service includes staff engagement surveys, engagement calender audit, internal communication audits, organizational behavior change.

It also helps corporate brands to achieve different objectives via town hall and rewards & recognition programs, product launches and promotions, fun workshops and fun at work activities, annual day events, family day events etc.

Internal communications is a powerful medium to target the dedicated audience of employees. Engage4more devised a proactive and dynamic communication process through newsletters, HR communications, organizational behavior change campaigns.

Engage4more has worked for much bigger corporate brands such as Standard Chartered, Godrej, Disney, TCS, DOW, Tata AIG Life Insurance, Linked in and a lot more.
